en-US.entity_not_found: The requested entity could not be found with the provided ID: :id
en-US.mapping_failed: Failed to map raw database data to the entity: :entity
en-US.collection_mapping_failed: Failed to map raw database data to the collection: :collection
en-US.invalid_entity_name: The provided entity name is not valid in this context: :name
en-US.invalid_collection_name: The provided collection name is not valid in this context: :name
en-US.invalid_argument: An invalid argument was provided for the repository method.
en-US.unauthorized_method: The operation is not authorized in this specific context.
en-US.item_not_found: The requested item could not be found with the provided ID: :id
